subject: HTML Testrunner
msgSnippet: Hi, Ive written an HTML JUnit test runner.  Like the text runner, but generates HTML.  Obviously, this is implemented by the ANT tasks but, since we use a make
messageBody:
Hi,

Ive written an HTML JUnit test runner. Like the text runner, but
generates HTML. Obviously, this is implemented by the ANT tasks but,
since we use a make build, this isnt terribly useful to me. Its
prototype code at the moment, but it works. Ive implemented
TestListener. My columns currently include:

- Test name
- Output (with stderr coloured differently to stdout)
- Problem (ie. Exception or Assert)
- Time
- Memory delta

I use Velocity to do the formatting and stick some summary data at the
top.

Has anyone else done one of these? Is anyone else interested? Should
I publish the code?

Andrew.
